name: A Byte-sized Adventure
description:
In this game you're a robot, looking for a lost ancient technology. But you got lost yourself! Find your way out, with or without the artifact.

Unfortunately didn't have a lot of time, but I did not want to skip the jam twice in a row. I'm pretty happy with the results :)

Unfortunately I did not have time to add sounds (or polish). Actually retrieving the Luminescence Amplifying Machine Prototype is completely optional and not acknowledged.

Known issues:

 - y-order of some objects

 - traps might activate when engaging with a core gameplay mechanic
